metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34087 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An improper array index validation vulnerability exists in the EVCD var lenparsing functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted .evcd filecan lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open amalicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gtkwave: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
